This vignette explains how researchers can use the USSC ios slides HTML template. I have created a GIF explaining the process. Please update the ussc package by reinstalling the R package from Github.

```{r gif, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("https://zmeers.github.io/gifs/example_ioslides.gif")
```
